title: Lightnin' Hopkins - 1962 - Mojo Hand FLAC
description:
Lightnin' Hopkins - 1962 - Mojo Hand

This album, recorded for Fire Records, is especially interesting because it casts Hopkins in a more R&B-flavored environment. This obvious effort to get a hit makes for some excellent blues; moody and powerful performances play throughout. There's even a charming novelty Christmas blues, "Santa." (AllMusic)

Trak list:
01 - Mojo Hand
02 - Coffee for Mama
03 - Awful Dreams
04 - Black Mare Trot
05 - Have You Ever Loved a Woman
06 - Glory Be
07 - Sometimes She Will
08 - Santa
09 - Shine On, Moon!
10 - Shake That Thing
11 - Walk a Long Time
12 - Last Night
13 - Just Picken'
14 - Bring Me My Shotgun
15 - Mojo Hand

Enjoy and share!
